name: Memory Leap (Jacob Lister)
description:
I created Memory Leap for the Mix and Game Jam 2020. The theme was: Mixing genres and we had 48 hours to make a game.

I decided to create a memory/puzzle/parkour game where you're given a sequence of coloured squares to memorize, then you must jump onto the corresponding platforms to try and reach the goal.

The music in this game was made by myself -  within the 48h's.

Download it and have a play, let me know what you think!

I had a lot of fun making this game and have learnt a lot from it!

ControlsWASDMove playerSpaceJump
